slide.title: Installation and Setup
slide.subtitle: SVN
slide.example:
// checkout trunk and script directories: mkdir ezcomponents cd ezcomponents svn co http://svn.ez.no/svn/ezcomponents/scripts svn co http://svn.ez.no/svn/ezcomponents/trunk
// Setup autoload environment: scripts/setup-env.sh

<?php
ini_set( 'include_path', '/home/httpd/ezcomponents/trunk:.' );
require 'Base/src/base.php';

function __autoload( $className )
{
	ezcBase::autoload( $className );
}

ezcBase::checkDependency( 'Test', ezcBase::DEP_PHP_VERSION, '5.3.0' );
?>
